It's arrived! What an emotion 🎉!
The final cover of Building Micro-Frontends has arrived 😁

I also decided to share 2 #microfrontends tips every week on @Twitter, you'll get all them under #buildingMFE!

@OReillyMedia #frontend #javascript #web #js #microservices #architecture https://t.co/N5A6fqcKfL
